channel.title: How to make server 24/7
channel.description: Hey, is there any way you can get a 24/7 server hoster, so like... It sets up the client and source and what-not and you get the server to own if you get me, its been a long time since i've tried to make a server and I need some help. So if the 24/7 provider only makes it 24/7 i would need to know how to sort of... Do it as in, Make the server 24/7 then how to set it up. Can anyone help, we'd let you be our first admin if you'd like!

item.title: How to make server 24/7
item.dc:creator: @Marine5287 Marine5287
item.description:
@Marine5287 wrote:

I think a have an idea of what you just said, but I’m not sure. You could VPS to host your server 24/7. If you’re asking for a hoster then this isn’t allowed in

this section. If you need help with getting a VPS then please use the search bar and you could also go here and look at the port forwarding tutorials. Good

luck, and in the future if you have any more questions about VPS, please post it here.

Read full topic

item.title: How to make server 24/7
item.dc:creator: @Orcja_Hunter Orcja Hunter
item.description:
